public class RemoteControl
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Class for remote controlling a autonomous sailing boat via a minimalistic user interface.

Author:
Patrick Rutter

Method Detail

sendCommands

private void sendCommands()
Attempts to send all relevant control commands (propellor, sail and rudder).

sendPropellorCommand

private void sendPropellorCommand(int value)
Sends a propellor adjustment command. Will ignore any value equalling the last value send to avoid unnecessary traffic.

Parameters:
value - to be send

sendSailCommand

private void sendSailCommand(int value)
Sends a sail adjustment command. Will ignore any value equalling the last value send to avoid unnecessary traffic.

Parameters:
value - to be send

sendRudderCommand

private void sendRudderCommand(int value)
Sends a rudder adjustment command. Will ignore any value equalling the last value send to avoid unnecessary traffic.

Parameters:
value - to be send

convertToNativeValue

private int convertToNativeValue(int value,
                                 int min,
                                 int nul,
                                 int max)
Converts a given value from -100 to +100 into the target range. Meant for converting the range of the slider values to a concrete value to be used as instruction value for the locomotion. Requires of the values to be following a general trend (min < nul < max).

Parameters:
value - to be converted
min - minimum target value (equals -100 slider)
nul - neutral target value (equals 0 slider)
max - maximum target value (equals +100 slider)
Returns:
converted value

convertToNativeValuePropellor

private int convertToNativeValuePropellor(int value,
                                          int min,
                                          int nul,
                                          int max)
